head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BARROW, RODGER MAX

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BARROW, RODGER MAX

block.p: BARROW-Rodger Max. Formerly Excutive Director of Utah's Repertory Dance Theatre and Director of Development for the Joffrey and Feld Ballets and City Center Theatre. Chair of New York's State Council for the arts dance panel. Died of complications from Aids on May 14, 2000, on Fire Island Pines. Received an MFA in photography from NYU in 1991. Became Fifth Avenue's Photographer documenting windows for Tiffany, Fendi, Gucci, Ferragamo, Fellissimo, Steuben, Bendel and Burberry. Born in Light, Arkansas, November 23, 1954. Survived by long time companion, Michael Kelly Bruce and domestic partner Chuck Pepe.
